function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Questionable research practices in Dutch institutes","Impact":"Undermining the reliability of research findings, including those related to contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Implementing strict research protocols, ethics guidelines, and oversight mechanisms","Technologies":"Research integrity software, data verification tools","People":"Researchers, research participants, public health","Owner":"Research institutions, funding agencies, ethical review boards"},{"Description":"Data sharing statements from COVID-19 trials","Impact":"Undermining the transparency and integrity of COVID-19 trial results","Mitigation":"Enforcing data sharing requirements, ensuring trial registration, audit mechanisms","Technologies":"Data sharing platforms, blockchain for data integrity","People":"COVID-19 patients, healthcare professionals, public health authorities","Owner":"Clinical trial sponsors, regulatory agencies, research ethics committees"}]}
